entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is mentioned as someone who needs to be seen before the judges give out the score. She is also described as having to mop up Diggory already.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as congratulating Harry on his task completion and revealing that he had shown Harry the dragons beforehand.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Charlie is mentioned by Hagrid as saying that the Horntail was the worst dragon to face.

entities.name: professor moody
entities.description: Professor Moody is described as looking very pleased and having his magical eye dancing in its socket.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as telling Harry to go to the first aid tent.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as being in the first aid tent and not seeming badly injured.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the passage and is described as completing a task against the Horntail dragon.

entities.name: diggory
entities.description: Diggory is mentioned as someone who Madam Pomfrey had to mop up already.

entities.name: horntail
entities.description: The Horntail dragon is described as being the worst dragon to face according to Charlie.

relationships.description: Hagrid congratulates Harry on his task completion.
Professor Moody commends Harry on his task completion.
Professor McGonagall directs Harry to the first aid tent.
Madam Pomfrey had to mop up Diggory already.
